main event: A witness reported a UFO sighting in Riverdale, New York in 1968 that involved an object hovering and moving in various directions.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 15 ft over a bridge., The sighting lasted approximately 1 to 2 minutes., The object appeared to be the size of a grain of rice held at arm's length and was about 1/2 mile away., The witness described it as emitting orange, red, and pink tones and moving slowly before speeding away., The object was considered the major source of illumination during the sighting but was not connected to any natural celestial object.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object moving slowly and hovering
